title: Lainuri configuration
description: Do carefully alter these configurations. If in doubt, ask for help.

master-barcode.description: Reading this barcode forces the Lainuri-UI to enter the Admin-mode

polling_interval.description: If the RFID reader polls for inventory, frequency of the polling. This consumes CPU resources and shortens the time to detect new and lost RFID tags.

afi-checkin.description: RFID ISO15691 AFI value written to the RFID tags on checkin. This disables the security gate alarm.

afi-checkout.description: RFID ISO15691 AFI value written to the RFID tags on checkout. This enables the security gate alarm.

double-check-gate-security.description: Make an extra check to make sure the RFID gate security status is set. This might increase confidence in setting the RFID tag's gate security status correctly, but causes the check-out/in to be 300-500ms slower.

eas.description: RFID ISO15691 EAS value written to the RFID tags on checkout/in. This enables the security gate alarm.

iso28560-data-format-overloads.description: List of overloads to detect RFID tags' ISO28560 data format outside the standard format identification rules.

!class.description: ISO28560 data format implementation to use if the given rules match

dsfid.description: RFID tag's DSFID code that must match so the !class data format is used

afi.description: RFID tag's AFI code that must match so the !class data format is used

ringtone_types.description: Audio alert types to ringtone mapping. Can be either the name of a known ringtone song, or the rtttl-code

css.description: These are injected to the body's css stylings

css_string.description: This is a full css-document that overloads other css-directives

check-out-receipt.description: System used to render check-in receipts? Use 'koha' to use Koha's receipt printing feature. Use 'lainuri' to define receipt templates in Lainuri.

printing-speed.description: How many dots the printer prints simultaneously.

printing-heat.description: How long a dot is heated. Too high values burn through, too low values leave a blank page.

printing-precision.description: Increase print precision at the cost of speed. Should not be more than 64

api_memoize_cache_size.description: How many different requests per endpoint are cached locally to the internal Koha API cache? Eg. How many most recent items' information to cache?

timeout_request_connect_ms.description: How long to wait for connection to the library system?

timeout_request_read_ms.description: How long to wait for the library system to reply after connection is made?

branchcode.description: Library system's internal branch/library code/identifier this device sits in

server.title: Lainuri server
server.description: Backend server configurations. You shouldn't change these.

rpc-daemon.description: RPC server to receive control and automation commands from an external process.

enabled.description: Enable the RPC server. This should never be used in production.

always_display_check_in_out_notification.description: Always show a popup notification telling where to place the Item. Otherwise shows a popup notification only if there are some special statuses or errors involved.

use_bookcovers.description: Display bookcovers (true) or show more condensed item information cards (false)

images.description: Inject custom images from the lainuri configuration directory (defaults to /etc/lainuri-serve/images) to the lainuri-ui public html files. They are loaded for the configured display positions.

items.description: Custom image rule to match a image file to a image place in the GUI

position.description: Image position identifier in the GUI.

src.description: The relative path to the image. HTML image src-attribute relative to the 'public html directory + /images/'. Must be a .png-image.

popup_inactivity_timeout_s.description: In seconds, how quickly the user's popup notifications are automatically closed?

session_inactivity_timeout_s.description: In seconds, how quickly the user's check-in/out session is canceled and the UI returned to the main menu, if the user doesn't do any actions.

show_item_statuses.description: By default show Item checkout/in statuses. Status display can be toggled by clicking the Item card.

enabled_locales.description: 2-character language codes to enable for Lainuri. Lainuri makes sure the langauge codes are installed if they exists.

default_locale.description: The locale which is loaded by default

messages.description: Overload translateable UI messages. See lainuri-ui/src/i18n.js for all the translation keys.

additionalProperties.description: This object property name is the 2-char locale to overload translations for.
This object property name is the UI module the keys are for
The translations keys for the given module and their translated meanings
